rules.description: Lack of "Start" node in the diagram
Lack of "End" node in the dagram
Multiple "Control" flow comes into "Action"
Multiple "Control" flows come into "Decision"
Incorrect format of Guard, try it with '[]'
Lack of Guard on "Decision" branch
Multiple "Control" flows go out from "Action"
X_Odd "Parallel" node
The type of Incoming Flows does not match the type of Outgoing Flows
The Incoming "Object"   of "Join" node should combine together.
X_Diagram should have less "Start" node
The Node does not have any Flows
X_The "Join" node has multiple Outgoing Flows.
The title of "Behavior" is not well formatted
The Node does not have any Incoming Flows
The node does not have any Outgoing Flows
The node has too many Incoming Flows
Invalid string property (This needs to Specify )
"Object" node has Non-Object flows coming into
"Object" node has Non-Object flows going out
"Start" node has multiple outgoing flows
"End"-like node has multiple incoming flows
"Decision" node does not have an 'Input Behavior'
Outgoing flows of "Decision" node are not unified.
"Behavior" has wrong type of Link going out.
Invalid Input flows comming into.
"Parallel" node has either one InputFlow or one OutgoingFlow.
The node has too many Outgoing flows.
Group node has 0 members.
